Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface ClientConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
SocketClientConnection, StubObservableClientConnection
public interface ClientConnection
Interface used by client and socketClientConnection to connect the client connection with server connection and permit them to communicate

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    void asyncSend​(MessageToClient message)  
    void closeConnection()
    Close the socket, input-stream and output-stream of connection
    void forceDisconnection()
    set the connection to close

    void ping​(PlayerIndex player)

  • Method Details

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Close the socket, input-stream and output-stream of connection

      Parameters:
      observer - add observer

    • asyncSend

      void asyncSend​(MessageToClient message)
      Parameters:
      message - send a response message to client from server

    • setClientIndex

      void setClientIndex​(PlayerIndex clientIndex)
      Parameters:
      clientIndex - set client index

    • isConnected

      boolean isConnected()
      Returns:
      boolean true if server is connected to client

    • ping

      void ping​(PlayerIndex player) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      player - of relative client
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - error on input or output stream thread that send a ping message to client to verify if he is alive

    • forceDisconnection

      void forceDisconnection()
      set the connection to close
